import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch' import Link from 'next/link' ProfilePage.getInitialProps = async ({ req, query }) => { const protocol = req ? `${req.headers['x-forwarded-proto']}:` : location.protocol const host = req ? req.headers['x-forwarded-host'] : location.host const pageRequest = `http://localhost:4000/api/profile?id=${query.id}` const res = await fetch(pageRequest) const json = await res.json() return json } function ProfilePage({ profile }) { return ( <>

{profile.name}

{profile.address}

{profile.email}

‚Üê Back to profiles
) } export default ProfilePage
